txt_en: Without a great party, there will be no prosperity and well-being.
txt_cn: 没有一个伟大的政党，就没有繁荣和幸福。

txt_en: Self-discipline is the first condition of freedom.
txt_cn: 自律是自由的首要条件。

txt_en: Don't rush to deny yourself before you get the result.
txt_cn: 在你还没得到结果之前，不要急于否定自己。

txt_en: The darker the sky, the brighter the stars.
txt_cn: 天空越黑，星星越亮。

txt_en: Every effort is the foreshadowing of luck.
txt_cn: 每一次努力都是幸运的伏笔。

txt_en: Our greatest glory consists not in never falling, but in rising every time.
txt_cn: 我们最值得自豪的不是从未跌倒，而是每次跌倒后都能站起来。

txt_en: Turn sweat into pearls and dreams into reality.
txt_cn: 把汗水变成珍珠，把梦想变成现实。

txt_en: At that time, youth was blooming, with the sun blazing and wind kissing the treetop.
txt_cn: 人间骄阳正好，风过树梢，彼时他们正当年少。

txt_en: Home is not a place, but a kind of memory.
txt_cn: 故乡不是一个地方，而是一种记忆。

txt_en: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
txt_cn: 当懊悔取代梦想时，人也就老了。

txt_en: We read to know we're not alone.
txt_cn: 我们阅读，是为了知道自己并不孤单。

txt_en: Love rises in the east and falls in the west, romance lasts till death.
txt_cn: 爱意东升西落，浪漫至死不渝。

txt_en: It's futile to rectify the past, but you can still change the future.
txt_cn: 悟以往之不谏，知来者之可追。

txt_en: Thank you for appearing in my youth.
txt_cn: 谢谢你出席我的青春。

txt_en: What we do in life echoes in eternity.
txt_cn: 今生所为终有回响。

txt_en: Talent indeed makes a person shine, but hard work does too.
txt_cn: 天赋的确使人闪闪发光，但努力也能使人熠熠生辉。

txt_en: Everything has cracks and that's where the light comes in.
txt_cn: 万物皆有裂痕，那是光照进来的地方。

txt_en: Youth is not afraid of the long years, there is still glory in the other side.
txt_cn: 少年不惧岁月长，彼方尚有荣光在。

txt_en: Those who miss each other will finally get together.
txt_cn: 错失彼此的人终有一朝重逢。

txt_en: Be the protagonist of your own youth, rather than a foil for others.
txt_cn: 做自己青春的主角，而不是他人的陪衬。

txt_en: Give it your best shot every time.
txt_cn: 每一次都要拼尽全力。

txt_en: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
txt_cn: 身在井隅，心向璀璨。

txt_en: Love is imagination. The other is the carrier. It's you who give the meaning to it.
txt_cn: 爱是想象力，对方是载体，是你赋予它意义。

txt_en: When you cry for missing the sun, you will miss the stars again.
txt_cn: 当你为错过太阳而哭泣时，你也要再错过群星了。

txt_en: The smartest people understand that they are the most ignorant ones.
txt_cn: 最聪明的人明白自己是最无知的。

txt_en: You can do whatever you want, but you can't drift with the tide.
txt_cn: 你可以随心所欲，但不能随波逐流。

txt_en: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
txt_cn: 求知若饥，虚心若愚。

txt_en: I am still waiting for you in situ, but you have forgotten you had been here once.
txt_cn: 我还在原地等你，你却已经忘记曾来过这里。

txt_en: Don't trouble trouble till trouble troubles you.
txt_cn: 不要自找麻烦，除非麻烦找上门。

txt_en: Be loyal to yourself. Laugh heartily, cry heartily.
txt_cn: 做一个忠于自己的人。笑得放肆，哭得酣畅。

txt_en: Shoot for the moon, even if you miss it, you'll land among the stars.
txt_cn: 奔赴月亮吧，即便错过，你也将置身于繁星之中。
